radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis, gallstones in the gallbladder, gallbladder wall edema, normal liver without focal lesions, normal spleen, unremarkable kidneys and adrenal glands, normal pancreas, minimal atherosclerotic calcification of aorta, free fluid in the pelvis, psammomatous calcifications in the prostate gland, no destructive bony lesions.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Gallbladder wall edema was noted which was not evident on the prior ultrasound.
